mapper.select: SELECT xs.xh,xs.xm,xs.xbm,xs.csrq,xs.jg,xs.sfzjh,xs.zym,xs.rxny,xs.rxnj,xs.bh,zy.zymc zymc,xs.xjzt FROM gxxs01_bzks xs LEFT JOIN gxxx04_bj bj ON xs.bh=bj.bh LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy zy ON xs.zym=zy.zyh WHERE xs.bh=#{bh} AND xjzt='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE xjztmc!='退学'
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,xs.zym dm,zy.zymc mc FROM gxxs01_bzks xs LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy zy ON xs.zym=zy.zyh WHERE xs.xjzt='1' GROUP BY zym ORDER BY zcount DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,xs.rxnj mc FROM gxxs01_bzks xs WHERE zym=#{zym} AND xjzt='1' GROUP BY rxnj ORDER BY rxnj
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,xs.bh mc FROM gxxs01_bzks xs WHERE zym=#{zym} AND rxnj=#{rxnj} AND xjzt='1' GROUP BY bh ORDER BY zcount DESC

SELECT xs.xh,xs.xm,xs.xbm,xs.csrq,xs.jg,xs.sfzjh,xs.zym,xs.rxny,xs.rxnj,xs.bh,zy.zymc zymc,xs.xjzt FROM gxxs01_bzks xs LEFT JOIN gxxx04_bj bj ON xs.bh=bj.bh LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy zy ON xs.zym=zy.zyh WHERE xjzt='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc!=''
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc!='' AND zwmc!='' AND zwmc!='教师' AND zyjszwmc !='工勤';
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc!='' AND zwmc!='' AND zwmc = '教师' AND zyjszwmc!='工勤';
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc ='工勤';

SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,xbm xbm, zwmc zwmc,zyjszwmc zyjszwmc,is_wp iswp,is_ggjzg isggjzg,is_zydtr iszydtr,is_ssjzg isssjzg FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc !='' AND zwmc!='' AND zwmc!='教师' OR zyjszwmc='工勤'
SELECT sbzcz*10000 FROM tr_xx_zcqk WHERE year='2017'
SELECT sbzcz zcount ,year mc FROM tr_xx_zcqk
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,gb.zymc mc,gbz.zyh dm FROM gxxx_bysqk gb LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy gbz ON gb.zymc=gbz.ZYMC WHERE bylx =#{bylx} GROUP BY zymc
SELECT SUM(pxrs) FROM tr_zy_xs
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxgz04_xwsxjd
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount ,xwsxjdjlrq mc FROM gxgz04_xwsxjd GROUP BY xwsxjdjlrq ORDER BY xwsxjdjlrq
SELECT xwsxjdh ,xwsxjdmc ,sxxm ,syzy ,xwsxjdjlrq FROM gxgz04_xwsxjd WHERE xwsxjdjlrq = #{jdrq}
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc='高级讲师')/COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc='讲师' OR zyjszwmc='高级讲师'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_ssjzg='1'
SELECT zdmj FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT xsmj FROM tr_xx_xxmj
SELECT jxjfzyf_tyg FROM tr_xx_xxmj
SELECT ts_hj FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE nf='2017' AND zclx='1'
SELECT ts_hj zcount ,nf mc FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE zclx='1' ORDER BY nf
SELECT gdzc_sb_hj*10000 FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE nf='2017' AND zclx='1'
SELECT jsj_hj FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE nf='2017' AND zclx='1'
SELECT jsj_hj zcount ,nf mc FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE zclx='1' ORDER BY nf

SELECT zdmj zdmj ,zdmj_lhyd zdmjlhyd,xsmj xsmj,xsmj_xxcq xsmjxxcq ,xsmj_fxxcq xsmjfxxcq,jxjfzyf jxjfzyf, jxjfzyf_js jxjfzyfjs,jxjfzyf_tsg jxjfzyftsg,jxjfzyf_sys jxjfzyfsys,jxjfzyf_tyg jxjfzyftyg,jxjfzyf_ht jxjfzyfht,xzbg xzbg,shyf shyf , shyf_sxss shyfsxss,xhyf_xxst xhyfxxst,xhyf_jgss xhyfjgss,shyf_jgst shyfjgst,shyf_shfl shyfshfl,jgzc jgzc,qtyf qtyf FROM tr_xx_xxmj
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE xjzt='1' OR xjzt='3'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy
SELECT zyh,zymc,zyyxmc,xz ,zylx FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE kcxzdm='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE kcxzdm='2'

SELECT kcdm,kcmc,zydm,xf,zymc, njdm,njmc, kcxzdm,kcxzmc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE 1=1
AND njdm=#{nf}
SELECT kcdm,kcmc,zydm,xf,zymc, njdm,njmc, kcxzdm,kcxzmc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE kcxzdm='1'
SELECT kcdm,kcmc,zydm,xf,zymc, njdm,njmc, kcxzdm,kcxzmc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE kcxzdm='2'
SELECT zymc FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE zyh=#{zym}
SELECT zdmj_lhyd FROM tr_xx_xxmj
SELECT xsmj_xxcq FROM tr_xx_xxmj
SELECT dzts zcount ,year mc FROM tr_xx_zcqk ORDER BY year
SELECT jxjfzyf FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT xzbg FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT wldmtjs FROM tr_xx_zcqk WHERE year='2017'
SELECT nr FROM gxxx_xxjbqk WHERE bh='8' AND nf='2017'
SELECT nf mc ,nr zcount FROM gxxx_xxjbqk WHERE bh='8'
SELECT swkcs FROM gxxx_xxhjsqk WHERE nf='2017'
SELECT nf mc,swkcs zcount FROM gxxx_xxhjsqk
SELECT SUM(gws) FROM tr_xx_xnxjjd WHERE year='2017'
SELECT year mc ,SUM(gws) zcount FROM tr_xx_xnxjjd GROUP BY year
SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,xbm xbm, zwmc zwmc,zyjszwmc zyjszwmc,is_wp iswp,is_ggjzg isggjzg,is_zydtr iszydtr,is_ssjzg isssjzg FROM gxjg01_jzg WHERE zyjszwmc !='' AND is_ssjzg='1'

SELECT SUM(jdxsl) FROM gxgz04_xwsxjd

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfhqsz='是' AND year='2017'
SELECT zydm dm,zymc mc FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE zydm!='' GROUP BY zydm,zymc
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE year='2017' AND zydm=#{zym}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE year='2017' AND sfhqsz='是'

SELECT xm,xb,nj,bjmc,sfdk,sfzg,qxx,jydwxz,jydw,sfhqsz,hqszmc,zydm,zymc,year FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfhqsz='是'
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE zym=#{zym}
SELECT zym dm,zymc mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE zym!='' GROUP BY zym,zymc

SELECT xs.xh,xs.xm,xs.xbm,xs.csrq,xs.jg,xs.sfzjh,xs.zym,xs.rxny,xs.rxnj,xs.bh,zy.zymc zymc,xs.xjzt FROM gxxs01_bzks xs LEFT JOIN gxxx04_bj bj ON xs.bh=bj.bh LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy zy ON xs.zym=zy.zyh WHERE rxnj=#{nf} AND zym=#{zym} AND xjzt='1'
SELECT rxnj zcount FROM gxxs01_bzks GROUP BY rxnj
SELECT xzsbzcz zcount ,year mc FROM tr_xx_zcqk ORDER BY year
SELECT jxjfzyf FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT jxjfzyf_js jxjfzyfjs,jxjfzyf_tsg jxjfzyftsg,jxjfzyf_sys jxjfzyfsys,jxjfzyf_tyg jxjfzyftyg,jxjfzyf_ht jxjfzyfht FROM tr_xx_xxmj
SELECT shyf FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT shyf_sxss shyfsxss,xhyf_xxst xhyfxxst,xhyf_jgss xhyfjgss,shyf_jgst shyfjgst,shyf_shfl shyfshfl FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT a.nf nf ,a.nr nr, a.dw dw,b.nr rwfs FROM gxxx_xxjbqk a LEFT JOIN gxxx_xxjbqk b ON a.bh=b.bh+1 WHERE a.bh=8 AND a.nf=#{nf} GROUP BY a.nf,a.nr,a.dw,b.nr
SELECT wlxxds_hj zcount ,nf mc FROM gxxx_xxhjsqk
SELECT gdzc_sb_dnxz zcount ,nf mc FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE zclx=1
SELECT zcje zcount ,zclx mc FROM zz_jfzclb WHERE year='2017'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_wp='0'
AND dept_name=#{zymc}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE 1=1
AND dept_name=#{zymc}
SELECT zyh dm ,zymc mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE zyh!=''
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE is_gjjsf='1' or is_gsfjs='1'

SELECT zyh,zymc,zyyxmc,xz ,zylx ,is_gsfjs isgsfjs, is_gjjsf isgjjfs FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE is_gjjsf='1' or is_gsfjs='1'
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE is_ssf='1'

AND year=#{nf}

SELECT zyh,zymc,zyyxmc,xz ,zylx ,is_szd isszd FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE is_szd='1'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT qtyf FROM tr_xx_xxmj WHERE year='2017'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE is_szd='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy
SELECT zyh,zymc,zyyxmc,xz ,zylx ,is_szd isszd,is_ssf isssf FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE is_szd!='1' AND is_ssf!='1' AND is_gjjsf!='1' AND is_gsfjs!='1'
SELECT zydm dm,zymc mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE zydm!='' GROUP BY zydm,zymc
SELECT njdm dm,njmc mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE zydm!='' GROUP BY njdm,njmc
SELECT jpkcsl zcount,year mc FROM zz_zy_jpkc
SELECT kcdm,kcmc,zydm,xf,zymc, njdm,njmc, kcxzdm,kcxzmc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE njdm=#{nf} limit 0,5
SELECT year mc ,xz zcount ,tt xcount FROM zz_xtttkc ORDER BY year
SELECT kcdm,kcmc,zydm,xf,zymc, njdm,njmc, kcxzdm,kcxzmc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE njdm=#{nf} limit 6,11
SELECT nf mc ,swkcs zcount FROM gxxx_xxhjsqk ORDER BY nf
SELECT areaCode dm , CONCAT(s.province,s.city) mc FROM s_area_code s
SELECT dm ,mc FROM gx_code_pycc
SELECT SUM(ZSS) FROM tr_xx_zsqk WHERE YEAR='2017'
SELECT year mc,SUM(byss) zcount,SUM(jyrs) xcount FROM tr_xx_zsqk GROUP BY year
SELECT zymc mc,(COUNT(1)-1)/COUNT(1)*100 zcount FROM gxxx_bysqk GROUP BY zymc
SELECT zydm dm,zymc mc FROM gxxx_bysqk GROUP BY zymc,zydm
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE year='2017' AND jydw=#{mc}
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount ,RXNJ mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE zymc=#{zymc} GROUP BY RXNJ
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,rxnj mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE xjztmc='退学' GROUP BY rxnj ORDER BY COUNT(1)

SELECT xm,xb,nj,bjmc,sfdk,sfzg,qxx,jydwxz,jydw,sfhqsz,hqszmc,zydm,zymc,year FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE year='2017'
AND zydm=#{zym}
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,dept_name mc,dept_id dm FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zyjszw_dj in ('中级','副高级') GROUP BY dept_id,dept_name

SELECT avg(gz) zcount FROM zz_bysxz WHERE 1=1
AND zy=#{zymc}
SELECT gws zcount,mxzy_zhu mc FROM tr_xx_xnxjjd WHERE year='2017' AND mxzy_zhu!='' ORDER BY gws desc
SELECT yqsbz zj,mxzy_zhu mc FROM tr_xx_xnxjjd WHERE year='2017' AND mxzy_zhu!='' ORDER BY yqsbz desc
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,zymc mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE zymc!='' AND rxnj='2017' GROUP BY zymc
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,pyccmc mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE pyccmc!='' AND rxnj='2017' GROUP BY pyccmc
SELECT bh mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE bh!='' GROUP BY bh

SELECT xs.xh,xs.xm,xs.xbm,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE()),xs.jg,xs.sfzjh,xs.zym,xs.rxny,xs.rxnj,xs.bh,zy.zymc zymc,xs.xjzt FROM gxxs01_bzks xs LEFT JOIN gxxx04_bj bj ON xs.bh=bj.bh LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy zy ON xs.zym=zy.zyh WHERE xjzt='1'
AND xs.bh=#{bh}
AND xs.zymc=#{zymc}
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())<=15
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())>=16 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())<=20
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())>=21 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())<=25
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())>=26 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())<=30
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,xs.csrq,CURDATE())>=31
SELECT COUNT(*) zcount,xbm mc FROM gxxs01_bzks GROUP BY xbm
SELECT COUNT(*) zcount,mzmc mc FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE mzmc!='' AND mzmc!='汉族' GROUP BY mzmc

SELECT nnd mc,COUNT(*) zcount FROM( SELECT case WHEN bfzkscj<=60 THEN '60分及以下' WHEN bfzkscj>=61 AND bfzkscj<=70 THEN '61-70分' WHEN bfzkscj>=71 AND bfzkscj<=80 THEN '71-80分' WHEN bfzkscj>=81 AND bfzkscj<=90 THEN '81-90分' WHEN bfzkscj>=91 THEN '90分及以上' end as nnd FROM gxjx01_bzks_kscj WHERE bfzkscj!='' ) gxjx01_bzks_kscj GROUP BY nnd

SELECT xh,xn,xm,BFZKSCJ,kcmc,kcdm,bjdm,bjmc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kscj WHERE 1=1
AND xs.bh=#{bh}
AND xs.zymc=#{zymc}
AND BFZKSCJ<=60
AND Bbfzkscj>=61 AND bfzkscj<=70
AND bfzkscj>=71 AND bfzkscj<=80
AND bfzkscj>=81 AND bfzkscj<=90
AND bfzkscj>=91

SELECT xs.xh,xs.xm,xs.xbm,xs.csrq,xs.jg,xs.sfzjh,xs.zym,xs.rxny,xs.rxnj,xs.bh,zy.zymc zymc,xs.xjzt FROM gxxs01_bzks xs LEFT JOIN gxxx04_bj bj ON xs.bh=bj.bh LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy zy ON xs.zym=zy.zyh WHERE rxnj=#{nf} AND zymc=#{zymc} AND xjzt='1'

SELECT xm,xb,nj,bjmc,sfdk,sfzg,qxx,jydwxz,jydw,sfhqsz,hqszmc,zydm,zymc,year FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfdk='是'
AND hylx=#{lb}
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,jyqd mc FROM gxxx_bysqk GROUP BY jyqd
SELECT yjbys_dgsxdwmc mc FROM gxxs_dgsx GROUP BY yjbys_dgsxdwmc
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs_dgsx WHERE yjbys_qysfly='是' AND year =a.year GROUP BY year)/COUNT(1) zj ,year mc FROM gxxs_dgsx a GROUP BY year
SELECT zymc mc,zydm dm FROM gxxx_bysqk GROUP BY zymc,zydm
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_id not in ('02','03','04')
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_id=a.yxsh) xcount,a.yxmc mc,a.yxsh dm FROM gxxs01_bzks a WHERE a.yxsh!='' AND a.yxmc!='' GROUP BY a.yxsh,a.yxmc

SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,xbid xbm,dept_id yxsh,dept_name yxmc,xlmc,zzmmmc zzmmm FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_name !=''
AND dept_id=#{zym}

SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,xbid xbm,dept_id yxsh,dept_name yxmc,xlmc,zzmmmc zzmmm,is_jz isjz FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_name !=''
AND dept_id=#{zym}
SELECT zgh,xm,xbid xbm,dept_id yxsh,dept_name yxmc,xlmc,zzmmmc zzmmm FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_id in ('02','03','04')
SELECT (COUNT(1)*100)/(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_id !="" AND is_jslx=1) zcount,dept_id dm,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_jslx=1 GROUP BY dept_id,dept_name
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount ,dept_id dm,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zw = '教师' AND zyjszw_mc!='工勤' GROUP BY dept_id,dept_name
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount ,dept_id dm,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_id in ('02','03','04') GROUP BY dept_id,dept_name

SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,xbid xbm,dept_id yxsh,dept_name yxmc,zzmmmc zzmmm,zyjszw_mc zyjszwmc FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zyjszw_mc='高级讲师'
AND dept_name=#{zymc}
SELECT (COUNT(1)*100)/(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE dept_name=a.dept_name) zcount,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic a WHERE is_ssjzg='1' GROUP BY dept_name

SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,xbid xbm,dept_id yxsh,dept_name yxmc,zzmmmc zzmmm,zyjszw_mc zyjszwmc,is_ssjzg isssjzg FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_ssjzg='1'
AND dept_name=#{zymc}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE year='2017' AND dl='期刊'
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,year mc FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='期刊' GROUP BY year
SELECT SUM(je)/(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs01_bzks) FROM zz_bkqk WHERE year='2017'
SELECT (SUM(je)*10000)/(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs01_bzks) zcount,year mc FROM zz_bkqk GROUP BY year

SELECT lx mc ,je zcount FROM zz_bkqk WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT year mc,COUNT(1) zcount FROM tr_jzg_basic GROUP BY year

SELECT xzsbmc mc,sl bl1,je bl2,year bl3 FROM zz_xzsb WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT mc mc,mj bl1,lx bl2,YEAR bl3 FROM zz_xzyfmj WHERE lx='其它'

SELECT mc mc,mj bl1,lx bl2,year bl3 FROM zz_xzyfmj WHERE lx='教学、辅助'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT mc mc,mj bl1,lx bl2,year bl3 FROM zz_xzyfmj WHERE lx='行政'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT mc mc,sl bl1,je bl2,year bl3 FROM zz_jsj WHERE lx='新增'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT jsmc mc,wllx bl1,jsjsl zcount,tyysl xcount ,zws bl2,year bl3 FROM zz_wldmt WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT mc mc,sl zcount,lx bl1,year bl3,gws xcount FROM zz_gwsmx WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT dept_id dm,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic GROUP BY dept_id,dept_name

SELECT xwsxjdh ,xwsxjdmc ,sxxm ,syzy ,xwsxjdjlrq FROM gxgz04_xwsxjd WHERE 1=1
AND xwsxjdjlrq = #{nf}

SELECT zclx mc,zcje bl1 FROM zz_jfzclb WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT xm mc,gzdl_dwmc title,gzdl_gw bl1,gzdl_sj bl2, gzdl_pcbm bl3 FROM tr_jzg_gzdl
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs01_bzks
SELECT zyh,zymc,zyzt,year FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE zyzt in ('0','2')
SELECT zyh,zymc,zyzt,year FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE zyzt ='1'
SELECT zyh,zymc,zyzt,year FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE zyzt in ('0','2') AND xxlx!='全日制'
SELECT ks mc FROM zz_xzsb GROUP BY ks
SELECT mc mc,mj zj FROM zz_xzyfmj WHERE year='2017' AND lx='教工住宅'
SELECT mc mc,mj zj FROM zz_xzyfmj WHERE year='2017' AND lx='其它'
SELECT SUM(sl) zcount ,year mc FROM zz_xxbkxx GROUP BY year

SELECT lx mc,sl zcount FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='期刊'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT sl zcount,lx mc FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='图书'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT sl zcount,lx mc FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='电子书'
AND year=#{nf}

SELECT xzsbmc mc ,sl bl1 ,ks bl2,lx bl3 FROM zz_xzsb WHERE lx='通用设备'
AND year!=#{nf}

SELECT xzsbmc mc ,sl bl1 ,ks bl2,lx bl3 FROM zz_xzsb WHERE lx='专业设备'
AND year!=#{nf}
SELECT mc mc,jdsl zcount,YEAR bl1 FROM zz_jdfb WHERE YEAR=#{nf}

SELECT zclx mc,zcje zj,year bl1 FROM zz_jfzclb WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT mc mc,sg bl1,tz bl2, sl bl3,title sfhg FROM zz_xstzqk
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zzmmmc='党员' GROUP BY dept_name

SELECT hdmx mc,rs zcount,year bl1 FROM zz_djpxhd WHERE lx='1'
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT xm xm,xbid xbm,dept_name yxmc,zzmmmc zzmmm FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zzmmmc='党员' ORDER BY rAND() limit 10

SELECT hdmx mc,rs zcount,year bl1 FROM zz_djpxhd WHERE lx='2'
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,year mc FROM zz_djpxhd WHERE lx='2' GROUP BY year
SELECT SUM(pxrs) zcount,year mc FROM tr_zy_xs GROUP BY year ORDER BY SUM(pxrs) desc

SELECT rcyj FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy WHERE 1=1
AND zymc=#{zymc}
SELECT xm xm,xbid xbm,dept_name yxmc,zzmmmc zzmmm FROM tr_jzg_basic ORDER BY rAND() limit 10

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zyjszw_dj in ('中级','副高级')
AND dept_name=#{zymc}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE xlmc='本科' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl1', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE xlmc='大专' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl2', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE xlmc='研究生' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl3' , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE xlmc='中专' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl4' ,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic a GROUP BY dept_name

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zyjszw_dj='初级' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl1', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zyjszw_dj='中级' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl2', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE zyjszw_dj='副高级' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl3' ,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic a GROUP BY dept_name

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_jz='0' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl1', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_jz='1' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl2' ,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic a GROUP BY dept_name

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_jslx='0' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl1', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE is_jslx='1' AND dept_name=a.dept_name) 'bl2' ,dept_name mc FROM tr_jzg_basic a GROUP BY dept_name

SELECT zgh zgh,xm xm,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE()) age,xbid xbm, dept_name yxmc,year year FROM tr_jzg_basic WHERE 1=1
AND dept_name=#{zymc}
AND year=#{nf}
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())=''
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())<=20
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())>=21 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())<=30
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())>=31 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())<=40
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())>=41 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())<=50
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,substring(sfzh,7,8),CURDATE())>=51

SELECT (SELECT SUM(zcje) FROM zz_jfzclb WHERE year='2017' AND zclx in ('图书购置','教学改革及研究费','学生培训费用'))/SUM(zcje) FROM zz_jfzclb WHERE year='2017'
SELECT (SELECT SUM(zcje) FROM zz_jfzclb WHERE year=a.year AND zclx in ('图书购置','教学改革及研究费','学生培训费用'))/SUM(zcje) zj,year mc FROM zz_jfzclb a GROUP BY year
SELECT xmmc mc,jfys bl1,lxsj bl2,zxzt bl3 FROM zz_jkyqk
SELECT ts_hj FROM gxxx_zcqk WHERE zclx='1' AND nf='2017'
SELECT SUM(sl) FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE year='2017' AND dl='图书'
SELECT SUM(sl) zcount,year mc FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='图书' GROUP BY year

SELECT xm mc,sl zcount,dl title,year bl1 FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='图书'
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT SUM(sl) FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='图书' AND year='2017'
SELECT SUM(sl) FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='图书' GROUP BY year

SELECT xm mc,sl zcount,dl title,year bl1 FROM zz_xxbkxx WHERE dl='图书'
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs_dgsx WHERE year='2017' GROUP BY yjbys_dgsxdwmc) a
SELECT zymc FROM gxxs_dgsx GROUP BY zymc
SELECT COUNT(1)/(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs_dgsx) zj,yjbys_dgsxdwmc mc FROM gxxs_dgsx GROUP BY yjbys_dgsxdwmc
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxs_dgsx WHERE yjbys_qysfly='是' AND yjbys_dgsxdwmc=a.yjbys_dgsxdwmc)/COUNT(1) FROM gxxs_dgsx a GROUP BY yjbys_dgsxdwmc
SELECT SUM(jzje) FROM zz_qyjz
SELECT SUM(jzje) zj,year mc FROM zz_qyjz GROUP BY year

SELECT mc mc,qymc bl1,jzje bl2 ,year bl3 FROM zz_qyjz WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tr_xx_qyss
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,year mc FROM tr_xx_qyss GROUP BY year

SELECT xm mc,zymc title,qymc bl1,ddmc bl2,szbm bl3 FROM tr_xx_qyss WHERE 1=1
AND year=#{nf}
SELECT mc mc,hdms bl1,hdrq bl2,lx bl3 FROM zz_hdylb WHERE lx='校企合作'
SELECT bm mc,zdsl zcount,jhsl xcount FROM zz_jbsj
SELECT wjm mc,dj bl1,sl zcount FROM zz_zyjxzyk
SELECT zymc ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zz_zyjdpxmx WHERE zymc=a.zymc) FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy a GROUP BY zymc

SELECT nnd mc,COUNT(*) zcount FROM( SELECT case
WHEN xsdxxmyd>=86 AND xsdxxmyd<=100 THEN '优' WHEN xsdxxmyd>=76 AND xsdxxmyd<=85 THEN '良' WHEN xsdxxmyd>=60 AND xsdxxmyd<=75 THEN '中' WHEN xsdxxmyd<60 THEN '差' end as nnd FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE xjzt='1' ) gxxs01_bzks GROUP BY nnd

SELECT nnd mc,COUNT(*) zcount FROM( SELECT case
WHEN xyaqmyd>=86 AND xyaqmyd<=100 THEN '优' WHEN xyaqmyd>=76 AND xyaqmyd<=85 THEN '良' WHEN xyaqmyd>=60 AND xyaqmyd<=75 THEN '中' WHEN xyaqmyd<60 THEN '差' end as nnd FROM gxxx_bysqk ) gxxx_bysqk GROUP BY nnd
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfdk='是' AND year='2017')/COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE year='2017'
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfdk='是' AND year=a.year)/COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk a GROUP BY year
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfzg='是' AND year='2017')/COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE year='2017'
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE sfzg='是' AND year=a.year)/COUNT(1) FROM gxxx_bysqk a GROUP BY year
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zz_sxxs)/((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zz_sxxs)+COUNT(1)) FROM gxxx_bysqk
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zz_sxxs WHERE year=a.year)/((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zz_sxxs WHERE year=a.year)+COUNT(1)) FROM gxxx_bysqk a GROUP BY year
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,zsqd mc FROM gxxs01_bzks GROUP BY zsqd

SELECT nnd mc,COUNT(*) zcount FROM( SELECT case
WHEN dwmyd>=86 AND dwmyd<=100 THEN '优' WHEN dwmyd>=76 AND dwmyd<=85 THEN '良' WHEN dwmyd>=60 AND dwmyd<=75 THEN '中' WHEN dwmyd<60 THEN '差' end as nnd FROM gxxx_bysqk ) gxxx_bysqk GROUP BY nnd

SELECT zyjnjdzmc mc,jdnr_zsmc bl1,jdnr_dj bl2,jldw_jb bl3,jldw_bm bl4,jdrs_sh bl5,jdrs_bxzxxs bl6 FROM gxxs_zyjnjd

SELECT hjmc mc,hjjb bl1,fjdw bl2,hjrq bl3 FROM tr_xx_hj WHERE hjjb in ('省级','国家级')

AND zymc=#{zymc}

SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,jgmc mc FROM gxxx_gljg WHERE drzw!='' GROUP BY jgmc

AND jgmc=#{zymc}
SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,rxnj mc FROM gxxs01_bzks GROUP BY rxnj
SELECT CONCAT(s.province,s.city) mc,COUNT(1) zcount FROM gxxs01_bzks a LEFT JOIN s_area_code s ON s.areacode=left(a.sfzjh,6) GROUP BY mc

SELECT zdmc mc,sssj bl1,wjmc bl2 FROM zz_xxgzzd

SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,year mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_zy GROUP BY year ORDER BY year
SELECT year mc FROM zz_jfzclb GROUP BY year ORDER BY year

SELECT SUM(zcje) zcount,year mc FROM zz_jfzclb GROUP BY year

SELECT SUM(zcje) zj,year mc FROM zz_jfzclb GROUP BY year ORDER BY year

AND rxqd=#{mc}
SELECT rxqd mc FROM gxxs01_bzks GROUP BY rxqd

AND dept_name=#{mc}

AND dept_name=#{mc}

SELECT COUNT(1) zcount,gb.zymc mc,gbz.ZYH dm FROM gxxs01_bzks gb LEFT JOIN gxjx01_bzks_zy gbz ON gb.zymc=gbz.ZYMC WHERE gb.zymc !='' GROUP BY gb.zymc

SELECT BJMC mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kscj WHERE BJMC IS NOT NULL AND zymc=#{zymc} GROUP BY BJMC
SELECT xn mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kscj GROUP BY xn
SELECT KCM mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_xssgyy WHERE KCM IS NOT NULL GROUP BY KCM
SELECT zymc mc FROM gxjx01_bzks_kc WHERE is_jpkc='是' GROUP BY zymc
SELECT xm mc,zymc bl1,jydw bl2,jsjdgks bl3,YEAR bl4,hqszmc bl5 FROM gxxx_bysqk WHERE hqszmc!='' AND YEAR=#{nf}
SELECT xh dm,xm mc,jg bl1,lsyy bl2,zymc bl3 FROM gxxs01_bzks WHERE lsyy!='' LIMIT 0,88 LIMIT 10,79 LIMIT 20,118
